message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slightly better deal for me to start us off.
Let's be practical, Alice. A 50/50 split avoids further losses from inflation.
I'm willing to be fair, Bob, but I won't accept an even split.  This is the same offer as last time. Let's avoid further losses.
Okay Alice, I'm meeting you closer to the middle.  It's time to settle this before inflation eats away any more.
